Class StageController

java.lang.Object

public class StageController extends Object

    • getStageController

      public static StageController getStageController()
      Returns the instance of the StageController.
      Returns:
      the instance of StageController

    • registerSceneController

      public void registerSceneController(SceneType sceneType, SceneController sceneController)
      Registers the scene controller in the scene, ready to be shown when requested using the type.
      Parameters:
      sceneType - the type of sceneController that is going to be registered
      sceneController - the sceneController that is going to be registered

    • showScene

      public void showScene(SceneType sceneType, boolean drawLayout) throws SceneControllerNotRegisteredException, StageNotSetException
      Shows the Scene in the Stage.
      Parameters:
      sceneType - the type of Scene that will be drawn
      drawLayout - true if the layout hasn't been created yet (first time scene is being shown) or if it has to be updated
      Throws:
      SceneControllerNotRegisteredException - if the requested Scene could not be found
      StageNotSetException

    • setStage

      public void setStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Sets the Stage which is the main object of the graphical window.
      Parameters:
      stage - the Stage in which the Scene will be shown

    • isReady

      public boolean isReady()
      Returns true if StageController has the Stage set and prepared.
      Returns:
      true if StageController has the Stage set and prepared.

    • setReady

      public void setReady(boolean ready)
      Sets the isReady parameter. When isReady is true, the GUI client can start.
      Parameters:
      ready -
